item.description:
The SSFMG & SSDOMG will have their first New Member Meetup @ the South Shore Plaza in Braintree. This is a great way for new members to meet myself and any other Group Organizers and Group Members in a casual low-pressure environment. This will also be an opportunity for Group Members to pay their Event Fee for the November 10th Combined Meetup.

Tuesday, October 30th, 2007
6:30pm
South Shore Plaza
250 Granite Street
(Route 37)
Braintree, MA 02184
781-843-8200

Meeting Place: Meet in the Food Court on the 2nd floor (above the Main Entrance) where we can grab a bite to eat or something to drink as we have our first "New Member Meetup."

Event/Group Organizer: Angela

Max/Min: No min or max.

Cost: $1 per person

RSVP Deadline: 4pm on Tuesday, October 30th / I will be there either way as I am walking the Mall beforehand (w/ the SSFMG) and will have dinner in the Food Court.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: SSDOMG & SSFMG New Member Meetup
